Description.Name: Training Module 1
Description.Details: This set of networked Battle Pods allow MechWarriors to compete against one another in simulated 'Mech battles, generating experience for participating MechWarriors. Each MechWarrior with less than 10,000 total experience will gain 20 experience points per day.

AssignedCastDescription: Commander, have you seen these simulator pods? They're fantastic! I take back everything bad I've ever said about the Argo. We gotta get these things running ASAP.
